text: Rodolfo Bebán (25 May 1938 – 14 August 2022) was an Argentine actor. He appeared in more than forty movies between 1962 and 2022. He was born in Ciudadela, Argentina. His best known roles were in Arm in Arm Down the Street, Hotel alojamiento, Juan Moreira and El Fantástico mundo de María Montiel. Bebán died on 14 August 2022, at the age of 84.Murió el actor Rodolfo Bebán ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Argentine television actors Category:Argentine stage actors Category:Actors from Buenos Aires
title: Rodolfo Bebán
